explanation: [0-0] An old man with white hair, wearing a green shirt and blue pants, is sitting on the side of the road, licking a blue cardboard. There is a guardrail behind him.
[0-2] The old man licks the cream on the cardboard over and over again.
[0-2] The old man licks the cream on the cardboard over and over again.

[2-9] Then the scene changes, a little girl in a yellow polka dot dress is having a birthday party by the road, wearing a birthday hat on her head. Beside her sits a woman in brown clothes, also wearing a birthday hat. On the table are cakes and drinks in blue cardboard boxes. The old man walks up to the table and points to the cake, gesturing if he could have some. The woman in brown waves her hand, refuses, and pushes the old man away.
